title: An ECG-based machine-learning approach for mortality risk assessment in a large European population
details: M Doneda, E Lanzarone, C Giberti, C Vernia… - Journal of Electrocardiology, 2024
abstract: Aims Through a simple machine learning approach, we aimed to assess the risk of all-cause mortality after 5 years in a European population, based on electrocardiogram (ECG) parameters, age, and sex. Methods The study included …
